casebody.data:
McCORMICK
v.
HANSON AGGREGATES SE, INC. No. 304P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2004. A. Lee Hogewood, III, Raleigh, for Hanson Aggregates Southeast.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2004 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2004."
